titleStmt.title: A holy life described and inforced on professors of Christianity, in a sermon / preached at Bishops-Castle in the County of Salop, Jan. 31. 1674/5 by Sam. Bolde Minister of Shapwick in Dorsetshire.
titleStmt.author: Bold, S. (Samuel), 1649-1737.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
